mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deployable_version (github_repository_url, git_commit_sha, service_id, commit_url, commit_message, commit_date, committer_avatar_url, committer_name) VALUES (#{githubRepositoryUrl}, #{gitCommitSha}, #{serviceId}, #{commitUrl}, #{commitMessage}, #{commitDate}, #{committerAvatarUrl}, #{committerName})
